vulnerabilities.name: Cookie without HttpOnly: _octo
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Set the HttpOnly flag to help mitigate client-side script access.

vulnerabilities.name: Possible Exposed Secrets in HTML
vulnerabilities.description: Found strings that may indicate API keys or secrets in page content or source.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Remove secrets from client-side code and store them server-side or in environment variables.

vulnerabilities.name: Forms without CSRF protections
vulnerabilities.description: 3 form(s) appear to lack obvious CSRF tokens (heuristic).
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement CSRF tokens or same-site protections for state-changing requests.

vulnerabilities.name: Inline Scripts / Event Handlers
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Avoid inline JS and use external scripts; use CSP to reduce XSS impact.
